overview_of_class: This is the second quarter of the Beginning German sequence: a systematic introduction to basic German. All four language skills - speaking, listening comprehension, reading and writing- are stressed to insure that students acquire a basic command of German.  Classes are conducted in German, except when explanations of grammar or other material require the use of English. Key features of this quarter: 1) Writing assignments, 2) Mystery Guest Interview and 3) Selected readings by Goethe and Heine.
name: Beginning German
subject: GERMAN
